summary: Internal utilities that bridge Prefect's validation system with Pydantic v2, supplying custom JSON schema generation (including special handling for Pendulum types) and a wrapper that adapts Pydantic v1 validation semantics to work with v2 models for function inputs and outputs.
business_intent: Allow Prefect workflows to seamlessly validate and serialize data using Pydantic v2 models without incurring heavy schema generation overhead, ensuring compatibility and ease of use for developers.
